reviews.name: Southern Textiles Pink Daybed Ensemble, 5pc
reviews.reviewText: This product was advertised as a five piece ensemble. When my 4-year old granddaughter opened her birthday gift, it contained a twin bed coverlet only--no sheets or pillowcases. So for the price of almost $80, it is not a good deal--nor was it as promised.
reviews.title: Not What it Appears

reviews.name: Southern Textiles Pink Daybed Ensemble, 5pc
reviews.reviewText: The bedding came with all of the pieces described. My daughter loves the bedding (she's 3, and pink is her favorite color). The fabric and appearance of the bedding are pretty generic and simply looking, but you get what you pay for, and it works for our needs! The comforter isn't too thin though, so it does serve its purpose!
reviews.title: Regular Pink Bedding

reviews.name: Southern Textiles Pink Daybed Ensemble, 5pc
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with the quality of this daybed ensemble. I've been looking for a nice set and did not want to pay an exorbitant amount which seems to be the case on many bedding websites. The comforter is thick and the bedskirt is made of durable material. Excellent product and great price!
reviews.title: Great addition to a daybed

reviews.name: Southern Textiles Pink Daybed Ensemble, 5pc
reviews.reviewText: Was expecting a 100% polyester (silky) bedding set. The top of the cover is 100% cotton twill which is very rough! The color is nice but for the type of material its dry clean only??? The material could handle anything, it's that tough! However the cover is only tacked in a couple areas so washing it in a washer would just bunch up the filling and leave it lumpy. Ok for the occasional guest but daily use it's uncomfortable!
reviews.title: 29 August 2013
